title: App Startup
text:
to start the application we need the following CLI=>
1.  npm init -y   =====> to create the basic package.json file
2.  npm i express =====> install the npm express library
3.  npm i uuid =====> install the universal unique id library
4.  npm i --save-dev nodemon =====> install node monitor that monitors the files for changes and restarts the server
5.  ADD "devStart":  "node run devStart" to scripts in package.json
6  npm run devStart =====> to start server with nodemon
